tasks.title: Set Up Google Fonts Integration
tasks.description: Configure and optimize Google Fonts loading for Poppins (headings) and Open Sans (body text) with proper performance considerations.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify fonts are loading correctly across all browsers using browser dev tools.
2. Test font loading performance using Lighthouse or WebPageTest.
3. Ensure fallback fonts display properly while custom fonts are loading.
4. Validate that no layout shifts occur when fonts load (check CLS in Core Web Vitals).
5. Test with slow network connections to ensure optimal font loading experience.

tasks.title: Implement Typography Style System
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive typography system with consistent sizing, line heights, and spacing using Poppins for headings and Open Sans for body text.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Create a typography test page showing all heading levels and text styles.
2. Verify consistent typography across different content sections.
3. Test readability on various screen sizes and devices.
4. Validate that line heights and spacing create a comfortable reading experience.
5. Check for any font rendering issues across different browsers and operating systems.
6. Ensure proper text wrapping and overflow handling.

tasks.title: Create Modern Testimonial Card Component
tasks.description: Design and implement modern testimonial cards with dark backgrounds, vibrant orange and teal accents, high contrast design, and fitness-focused dynamic styling for a premium, energetic feel with bold typography.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test the testimonial cards across different screen sizes to ensure responsive behavior.
2. Verify that circular profile images display correctly with different image aspect ratios.
3. Check that hover effects and transitions work smoothly across browsers.
4. Ensure proper spacing and alignment of all elements within the cards.
5. Test with different lengths of testimonial text to ensure proper text wrapping and card expansion.
6. Validate accessibility of the testimonial components using screen readers and keyboard navigation.
7. Verify that the dark background and high contrast text meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards.
8. Test the gradient accent bar and animations for performance on lower-end devices.
9. Ensure the vibrant orange (#FF6B35) and electric teal (#00E5FF) accents are consistent with the brand guidelines.
10. Validate that the premium, energetic feel matches the fitness-focused aesthetic in the provided screenshot.

tasks.title: Implement Responsive Layout System
tasks.description: Create a mobile-first responsive layout system with proper container classes, consistent spacing, and improved visual hierarchy for the website redesign.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test the responsive layout on various devices and screen sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop).
2. Verify that container classes maintain proper width constraints and centering.
3. Check that spacing is consistent throughout the site using the defined spacing system.
4. Validate that the grid system responds correctly at different breakpoints.
5. Test visual hierarchy by reviewing content flow and readability across devices.
6. Ensure that utility classes work as expected when applied to different elements.
7. Verify the single column layout for hero section and services section.
8. Test that social buttons display correctly with black background and appropriate hover effects.
9. Validate that the orange phone CTA button is properly styled and positioned.
10. Confirm the 'Only few spots left' element appears without a border.
11. Check that text colors are updated to black throughout the site.

tasks.title: Implement Visual Design Elements
tasks.description: Add modern visual design elements including soft box shadows, consistent border-radius, proper color contrast, and smooth hover transitions.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify consistent application of design tokens across all UI elements.
2. Test hover states and transitions for smoothness and consistency.
3. Validate color contrast ratios using WCAG 2.1 AA standards (minimum 4.5:1 for normal text).
4. Check that border-radius is consistently applied (12px) across all appropriate elements.
5. Test animations and transitions at different screen sizes and browsers.
6. Ensure box shadows render correctly across different browsers and devices.
7. Validate that the visual design maintains the Airbnb-inspired aesthetic.

3. Validate HTML using W3C Validator.

tasks.title: Implement Cross-Browser Compatibility
tasks.description: Ensure the modernized design works consistently across all modern browsers with appropriate fallbacks and progressive enhancement.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test the website on all major browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge).
2. Verify layout consistency across browsers using tools like BrowserStack or CrossBrowserTesting.
3. Test on older versions of browsers to ensure graceful degradation.
4. Validate that fallbacks work correctly when modern CSS features aren't supported.
5. Check for any browser-specific rendering issues, especially with shadows, transitions, and flexbox/grid layouts.
6. Test on different operating systems (Windows, macOS, iOS, Android) to ensure consistent rendering.
7. Verify that polyfills load and function correctly when needed.

tasks.title: Final Integration and Testing
tasks.description: Integrate all modernized components with the existing website functionality and conduct comprehensive testing to ensure everything works together seamlessly.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Conduct comprehensive cross-browser testing on all pages.
2. Perform user acceptance testing with stakeholders.
3. Test all existing functionality to ensure it works with the new design.
4. Validate responsive behavior across devices (mobile, tablet, desktop).
5. Conduct performance testing to ensure the site maintains or improves load times.
6. Test all forms and interactive elements with the new styling.
7. Verify accessibility compliance using automated tools and manual testing.
8. Create a test report documenting all tested scenarios and results.
